-----

So this is the original shorts that would later get reworked/remade into one of their later doujinshi (https://e-hentai.org/g/3417861/50731209cb/).

Personally, I think I find the original concept of a bratty princess adapting to the current age more fun over the amnesiac that she would eventually become.
n: [Doujinshi] [Niramikko Koujou] The Tale of Stealing the Bratty Tan-Skinned Princess [English] [NTerm]
